text: Balbissa was a town of ancient Cappadocia, inhabited in Byzantine times. The name Balbissa does not occur in ancient authors but is inferred from epigraphic and other evidence. Its site is located near Yaylaköy, Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cappadocia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Niğde Province
title: Balbissa
